sentences.english: This is probably the earliest record of a steam boiler explosion.
sentences.chinese: 这大概是最早记录的蒸汽锅炉发生爆炸。

sentences.english: This is a famous Yunnan dish—steam-pot chicken.
ABB was the first to provide China with a steam boiler.
sentences.chinese: 当时ABB向中国提供了第一台蒸汽锅炉。

sentences.english: The technology of instant concret steam boiler shelling is introduced.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了蒸汽锅炉耐火混凝土炉墙现浇成型施工工艺。

sentences.english: Boilermaker course sequences prepare individuals to use technical comprehension and ability to fabricate and repair steam boiler components.
sentences.chinese: 锅炉技师专业培养学生学习蒸汽锅炉部件制造和修理。

sentences.english: Steam boilers of 40 m height. An elevator near every boiler.
sentences.chinese: 40米高的蒸汽锅炉，每个蒸汽锅炉旁边都有升降机。

sentences.english: Steam boilers of 40 m height. An elevator near every boiler.
sentences.chinese: 40米高的蒸汽锅炉，每个蒸汽锅炉旁边都有升降机。

sentences.english: The furnace after steam boiler maintenance methods are there?
sentences.chinese: 停炉之后的蒸汽锅炉保养方法有哪些？

sentences.english: Introduces the steam boiler and booster step before the fire have those?
sentences.chinese: 介绍蒸汽锅炉升火前与升压步骤有那些？

sentences.english: Steam boiler work is controlled by computers.
sentences.chinese: 由计算机控制的蒸汽锅炉。

sentences.english: The famous foods in Kunming are Steampot chicken and Cross-bridge Rice Noodles, would you like to have a try?
sentences.chinese: 昆明最有名的食物是汽锅鸡和过桥米线，您想尝尝吗？

sentences.english: Marine steam boiler is an important industrial and civilian and military equipment, It is very extensive.
sentences.chinese: 本论文主要是针对船用蒸汽锅炉保护系统进行的研究。

sentences.english: What are the requirements of the steam boiler used?
sentences.chinese: 使用蒸汽锅炉的要求有哪些？

sentences.english: The characteristics of the furnace compared with the steam boiler, energy-saving about 50 percent.
sentences.chinese: 该炉的特点与蒸汽锅炉相比，节能50%左右。

sentences.english: The method has been applied successfully to the control of a steam boiler heating system.
sentences.chinese: 该方法已成功的应用于蒸汽锅炉加热功率控制。

definition: variant of 砂鍋|砂锅[sha1 guo1]
see 鍋|锅[guo1]/see 涮鍋子|涮锅子[shuan4 guo1 zi5]/bowl (of a smoking pipe etc)
pork chop/pork cutlet/spare ribs/(coll.) skinny person
to cook in a covered vessel/to casserole/to stew
raw materials for making soup/packaged soup mix
to stew in soy sauce and spices
fish head/fig. upright and unwilling to compromise
